backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining access control, counters, types, and CRUD logic for users, products, services, clients, appointments, photos, and transactions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing pages, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme CSS defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling page navigation and layout with a bottom-nav structure and toast support.
frontend/src/components/agenda/Appointme: Modal form to create appointments with client/service selection, datetime inputs, and backend mutation.
Displays appointment details with status badge, time, client, service, and notes.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandHeade: Header showing salon monogram and wordmark logos with premium styling.
frontend/src/components/clientes/ClientD: Displays a client's details and appointment history, pulling related services and formatting info in tabs.
frontend/src/components/clientes/ClientF: Dialog form for adding a new client with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/estoque/ProductC: Shows a product's basic info, stock level, and triggers quick stock adjustment.
frontend/src/components/estoque/ProductF: Dialog form for adding products to inventory with numeric validation and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/estoque/StockAdj: Dialog to increase or decrease a product's stock with validation and update logic.
frontend/src/components/expenses/IncomeV: Renders a Recharts bar chart comparing monthly income and expenses.
frontend/src/components/expenses/Transac: Form to create income or expense transactions with validation and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeCategor: Renders a grid of category buttons with icons that navigate to different PageView routes.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeHeroCar: Displays an auto-looping image carousel with navigation arrows and slide indicators.
frontend/src/components/home/WhatsAppFlo: Provides a floating WhatsApp contact button linking to a preset chat message.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, content area, floating WhatsApp button, bottom navigation, and desktop footer.
frontend/src/components/servicos/Service: Shows a service card with image, details, formatted duration and price, and an action button to schedule.
Implements a dialog form for adding new services with validation, presets, and backend submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Checks if the current authenticated user is an admin using the actor’s isCallerAdmin method.
frontend/src/hooks/useAgenda.ts: Fetches and filters appointments by status and date, and provides mutations to create new appointments.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientes.ts: Provides client list retrieval placeholder and mutations to add new clients through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useEstoque.ts: Fetches product inventory and exposes mutations for adding products and updating quantities.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth state, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a simple backend health query using the actor from useActor and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useServicos.ts: Implements service list querying and status toggling plus mutations for adding services using react-query and the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactions.ts: Provides transaction list querying, monthly aggregate fetching, and mutations for adding, updating, and deleting transactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light/dark modes with typography and texture utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AgendaDeHojePage.tsx: Renders the daily agenda page with date navigation, appointment list, and dialog for creating appointments.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogoDeServicosPag: Displays and filters the service catalog with search, nails filter, service cards, and dialogs for creating services or scheduling.
frontend/src/pages/ControleDeEstoquePage: Inventory control page with product filtering, low‑stock warnings, and dialogs for creating and adjusting products.
frontend/src/pages/ExpensesDashboardPage: Admin‑only expenses dashboard showing monthly aggregates, a bar chart, and a transaction form.
frontend/src/pages/FidelidadeClientesPag: Client management page with search, admin shortcuts, and dialogs for creating and viewing client details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with hero carousel, category grid navigation, and a call‑to‑action to schedule services.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash‑based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the project.
project_state.json: Defines the app’s state, design guidelines, and existing features for a luxury Portuguese salon-management app, including navigation, agenda, inventory, services, clients, and known domain validation issues.
